body_content.explanation: a teacher who has responsibility for the children in a school who have special needs (= who need special help because of a learning difficulty, illness, or condition that makes it difficult for them to learn in the way that other people do, or do the things that other people do). SENCo is short for special educational needs coordinator. :
examples: Yvonne is a SENCo at Cardinal Newman RC School.
The SENCO is will help identify the children in your class who have special needs.
